name: unified-repo-analyzer
description: A comprehensive tool for analyzing code repositories, generating executive summaries and technical breakdowns

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:backend && bun run build:cli && bun run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: bun run --cwd packages/backend test && bun run --cwd packages/frontend test && bun run --cwd packages/cli test && bun run --cwd packages/shared test
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/backend clean && bun run --cwd packages/frontend clean
scripts.deploy:prod: bun run build:prod && bun run docker:build && bun run docker:up

author: Unified Repository Analyzer Contributors
